mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM PARAMETROS p WHERE p.modulo = #{parametro.name} AND p.tipo = #{tipo.name}
SELECT p.* FROM PARAMETROS p WHERE p.modulo = #{modulo} AND p.tipo = #{tipo}

SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN TIPO = 'MAIL_HOST' THEN VALOR ELSE NULL END) AS MAIL_HOST, MAX(CASE WHEN TIPO = 'MAIL_PORT' THEN VALOR ELSE NULL END) AS MAIL_PORT, MAX(CASE WHEN TIPO = 'MAIL_SENDER_NAME' THEN VALOR ELSE NULL END) AS MAIL_FROM_EMAIL, MAX(CASE WHEN TIPO = 'MAIL_SENDER_NAME' THEN DESCRIPCION ELSE NULL END) AS MAIL_FROM_NAME, MAX(CASE WHEN TIPO = 'MAIL_USERNAME' THEN VALOR ELSE NULL END) AS MAIL_USERNAME, MAX(CASE WHEN TIPO = 'MAIL_PASSWORD' THEN VALOR ELSE NULL END) AS MAIL_PASSWORD FROM ( SELECT TIPO, VALOR, DESCRIPCION, row_number () over (partition by MODULO) as ROW_NUM FROM PARAMETROS WHERE MODULO = 'GENERAL' ORDER BY TIPO );

SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN TIPO = 'SAP_USERNAME' THEN VALOR ELSE NULL END) AS USER, MAX(CASE WHEN TIPO = 'SAP_PASSWORD' THEN VALOR ELSE NULL END) AS PASSWORD, MAX(CASE WHEN TIPO = 'URL_WSDL_SOLPED' THEN VALOR ELSE NULL END) AS WSDL_SOLPED, MAX(CASE WHEN TIPO = 'URL_WSDL_MATERIAL' THEN VALOR ELSE NULL END) AS WSDL_MATERIAL, MAX(CASE WHEN TIPO = 'URL_WSDL_PROVEEDOR' THEN VALOR ELSE NULL END) AS WSDL_PROVEEDOR, MAX(CASE WHEN TIPO = 'URL_WSDL_ORDEN_COMPRA' THEN VALOR ELSE NULL END) AS WSDL_ORDEN_COMPRA, MAX(CASE WHEN TIPO = 'URL_WSDL_HOMOLOGACION' THEN VALOR ELSE NULL END) AS WSDL_HOMOLOGACION FROM ( SELECT TIPO, VALOR, row_number () over (partition by MODULO) as ROW_NUM FROM PARAMETROS WHERE MODULO = 'WEB_SERVICE' ORDER BY TIPO );
